column3: Latest;Preah Vihear: A horrific incident occurred around 6 pm on February 3
column6: Preah Vihear province. Domestic violence caused by jealous anger has resulted in the death a newly married couples.------A 32 year old soldier
column11: and shortly after shot himself in the head.------It is reported that the couple had only been married for 5 days. Police investigated the scene and concluded that it was a case of murder-suicide and handed both bodies over to the families.------WARNING! ------ graphic images of scene.
